attributes.action: abolish VAT on digital downloadable material
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
VAT is currently applicable on digitised downloadable material such as ebooks, music and software, this levy should be abolished.

Downloadable material helps save the environment in many ways – energy in the manufacturing of hard versions of such products is eliminated – co2 emissions reduced to nil.

Trees are saved, downloadable material uses no paper or cardboard.

Music and software no longer need plastic cd cases.

Transportation of the hard copies of these goods is eliminated, huge saving on co2 emissions.

Landfill for packaging and the products is nil.
 
Total environmental savings of digitised goods worldwide is huge. The government is quick to add a green tax onto air travel, but fails to recognise the green savings of digitised products. 

Abolishing VAT on these products would encourage more companies to offer their products in a downloadable  digital format.

Please sign the petition to abolish VAT on these goods and make the world a greener place.
